def has_faucet(sink:item):
    # Determine whether the sink has a faucet
    symbol has_faucet=exists faucet:item: is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet,sink)
    return has_faucet

behavior fill_sink_with_water(sink:item):
    body:
        if has_faucet(sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet,sink)
            achieve is_on(faucet)
            # Turn on the faucet to fill the sink with water
            achieve has_water(sink)
            achieve_once is_off(faucet)
            # Turn off the faucet after filling the sink

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind bathroom_sink: item where:
            is_sink(bathroom_sink)
        # Select the bathroom sink
        fill_sink_with_water(bathroom_sink)

behavior observe_bathroom_sink(bathroom:item):
    body:
        # Observes the bathroom to locate the sink within it
        foreach sink: item:
            if is_sink(sink) and not visited(sink):
                observe(sink, "Locate the sink in the bathroom")

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind bathroom: item where:
            is_bathroom(bathroom)
        # Select the bathroom
        observe_bathroom_sink(bathroom)

def is_in_bathroom(sink:item):
    # Function to check if a sink is inside the bathroom
    symbol in_bathroom = exists room: item : is_bathroom(room) and inside(sink, room)
    return in_bathroom

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists sink: item : is_sink(sink) and is_in_bathroom(sink):
            # If we have already found the sink inside the bathroom, we can directly approach it
            bind sink: item where:
                is_sink(sink) and is_in_bathroom(sink)
            achieve close_char(char, sink)

        else:
            # If not found, check all sinks in the scene that have not been visited
            foreach sink: item:
                if is_sink(sink) and not visited(sink):
                    observe(sink, "Locate the sink in the bathroom")

def has_faucet(sink:item):
    # Determine whether this sink has a faucet
    symbol has_faucet=exists faucet:item: is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet,sink)
    return has_faucet

behavior clean_the_sink(sink:item):
    # Define the behavior to clean a dirty sink
    body:
        if has_faucet(sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet,sink)
            achieve_once is_on(faucet)
            scrub(sink)
            rinse(sink)
            achieve_once is_off(faucet)
        else:
            scrub(sink)
            rinse(sink)

behavior fill_sink_with_cleaning_solution(faucet:item, sink:item):
    body:
        achieve open(faucet)
        is_cleaning_solution(sink)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink) and id[sink]==42
        # Select sink with ID 42
        
        if dirty(sink):
            clean_the_sink(sink) # Clean the sink if it is dirty

        if has_faucet(sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet,sink)
            fill_sink_with_cleaning_solution(faucet, sink) # Fill the sink with a cleaning solution
